meta.label: API configuration
meta.description: Define presets for users to call the API with specific credentials, quota and parallelization parameters

params.name: separator_authentification
params.label: Authentification
params.description: Please refer to the Amazon documentation: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws-sec-cred-types.html#access-keys-and-secret-access-keys

params.name: aws_access_key_id
params.label: AWS access key id
params.description: AWS access key as string. If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: aws_secret_access_key
params.label: AWS secret access key
params.description: AWS secret access key as string. If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: aws_session_token
params.label: AWS session token
params.description: Optional AWS session token as string. If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: aws_region_name
params.label: AWS region name
params.description: AWS region name as a string. If empty, attempts to ascertain credentials from the environment.

params.name: separator_api_quota
params.label: API quota
params.description: (TODO: REMOVE?) Throttling to stay within the quota defined by Google Cloud: https://cloud.google.com/translate/quotas

params.name: api_quota_period
params.label: Period
params.description: (TODO: REMOVE?) Reset period of the quota in seconds. Defined by Google Cloud.

params.name: api_quota_rate_limit
params.label: Rate limit
params.description: (TODO: REMOVE?) Maximum number of requests per period for one DSS activity. Reduce for concurrent activities.

params.name: parallel_workers
params.label: Concurrency
params.description: Number of threads calling the API in parallel (max 100). Increase to speed-up computation within the quota defined above.
